data.title: Weather in Leicester in august: Temperature, Rainfall, Sunshine... for August 2024! - England
data.meta_description: Is the climate in Leicester (in England) in august good? Discover the weather forecast in august 2024 to prepare your trip.

Leicester in august: average Weather, Temperature and Climate

Best time to go to Leicester?

Weather in Leicester in august 2024

The weather in Leicester in the month of august comes from statistical datas on the past years. You can view the weather statistics for all the month, but also navigating through the tabs for the beginning, the middle and the end of the month.

Evolution of daily average temperature and precipitation in Leicester in august

These charts show the evolution of average minimum/maximum temperatures as well as average daily precipitation volume in Leicester in august.

The climate of Leicester in august is good

The climate in august in Leicester is wet (with 84mm of rainfall over 5 days). It should be noted an improvement from the previous month since in july it receives an average of 87mm of precipitation over 6 days.

The climate quite enjoyable in that area the month of august. Temperatures are up to 21°C. The minimum is 14°C. Thus, the mean temperature average on this month of august in Leicester is 17°C. Note that seasonal normals in contrast with those observed in Leicester in the month of august with a maximum record of 31°C in 2013 and a minimum record of 6°C in 2012. You can expect to have about 27 days with temperatures above 18°C, or 87% of time.

On average, in Leicester, the days of august last 14:43. The sun rises at 04:47 and sunset is at 19:30.

With a correct climate, august is okay (but not good) to go in this city.

Weather data for Leicester in august:

Weather data for Leicester for august are derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 in Leicester. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather in Leicester can vary slightly from year to year, but this data should limit surprises. So you can pack your bags or check for the best time in year to go to Leicester.
